items.title: Key changes: I left a career in music to become a trip leader
items.excerpt: Valeria has been leading Intrepid trips in Mexico for nine years, but before that, her life was music. Changing careers felt like a leap, until she realised that guiding travellers wasn’t quite the change of tune she thought it was.

items.title: How to max out your annual leave in 2026
items.excerpt: We’ve crunched the numbers so you don’t have to.

items.title: Let the good times roll: 6 new rail trips for 2026
items.excerpt: As Intrepid’s slower style of travel gains momentum, it’s full steam ahead for rail puns and train journeys alike.

items.title: Travelling through grief: How I found healing on a group trip to Morocco
items.excerpt: On a trip to Morocco, Chalice learns the power of personal ritual and purposeful reflection. As she processes her own grief, she connects with other travellers who have their own ways to honour those they’ve lost.
